204.description: Successfully regenerated deploy key and set shared secret

post.summary:
Restart all components in all environments of the application
  - Stops all running components in all environments of the application
  - Pulls new images from image hub in radix configuration
  - Starts all components in all environments of the application again using up-to-date image

AlertConfig.description: AlertConfig defines a mapping between a pre-defined alert name and a receiver

alert.description: Alert defines the name of a predefined alert

receiver.description: Receiver is the name of the receiver that will handle this alert

alertNames.description: AlertNames is the list of alert names that can be handled by Radix

enabled.description: Enabled flag tells if alerting is enabled or disabled

ready.description:
Ready flag tells tells if alerting is ready to be configured
Value is always false when Enabled is false
Vlaue is True if Enabled is true and Radix operator has processed the alert configuration

dnsAliases.description: DNS aliases showing nicer endpoint for application, without "app." subdomain domain

environments.description: Environments List of environments for this application

jobs.description: Jobs list of run jobs for the application

name.description: Name the name of the application

userIsAdmin.description: UserIsAdmin if user is member of application's admin groups

componentName.description: ComponentName the component exposing the endpoint

environmentName.description: EnvironmentName the environment hosting the endpoint

adGroups.description: AdGroups the groups that should be able to access the application

configurationItem.description:
ConfigurationItem is an identifier for an entity in a configuration management solution such as a CMDB.
ITIL defines a CI as any component that needs to be managed in order to deliver an IT Service
Ref: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Configuration_item

creator.description: Owner of the application (email). Can be a single person or a shared group email

name.description: Name the unique name of the Radix application

owner.description: Owner of the application (email). Can be a single person or a shared group email

radixConfigFullName.description: radixconfig.yaml file name and path, starting from the GitHub repository root (without leading slash)

readerAdGroups.description: ReaderAdGroups the groups that should be able to read the application

sharedSecret.description: SharedSecret the shared secret of the webhook

ApplicationRegistrationPatch.description: ApplicationRegistrationPatch contains fields that can be patched on a registration

adGroups.description: AdGroups the groups that should be able to access the application

configurationItem.description:
ConfigurationItem is an identifier for an entity in a configuration management solution such as a CMDB.
ITIL defines a CI as any component that needs to be managed in order to deliver an IT Service
Ref: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Configuration_item

owner.description: Owner of the application - should be an email

radixConfigFullName.description: radixconfig.yaml file name and path, starting from the GitHub repository root (without leading slash)

readerAdGroups.description: ReaderAdGroups the groups that should be able to read the application

ApplicationRegistrationPatchRequest.description: ApplicationRegistrationPatchRequest contains request with fields that can be patched on a registration

ApplicationRegistrationRequest.description: ApplicationRegistrationRequest describe a register application request

ApplicationRegistrationUpsertResponse.description: ApplicationRegistrationUpsertResponse describe an application upsert operation response

example: Repository is used in other application(s)

ApplicationSearchIncludeFields.description: ApplicationSearchIncludeFields specifies additional fields to include in the response of an ApplicationsSearchRequest

environmentActiveComponents.description: EnvironmentActiveComponents All component summaries of the active deployments in the environments

name.description: Name the name of the application

ApplicationsSearchRequest.description: ApplicationsSearchRequest contains the list of application names to be queried

names.description: List of application names to be returned

AuxiliaryResource.description: AuxiliaryResource describes an auxiliary resources for a component

AuxiliaryResourceDeployment.description: AuxiliaryResourceDeployment describes the state of the auxiliary resource's deployment

replicaList.description: Running replicas of the auxiliary resource's deployment

status.description: Status of the auxiliary resource's deployment

AzureIdentity.description: AzureIdentity describes an identity in Azure

azureKeyVaults.description: The Azure Key Vaults names, which use Azure Identity

clientId.description:
ClientId is the client ID of an Azure User Assigned Managed Identity
or the application ID of an Azure AD Application Registration

serviceAccountName.description: The Service Account name to use when configuring Kubernetes Federation Credentials for the identity

AzureKeyVaultSecretVersion.description: AzureKeyVaultSecretVersion holds a version of a Azure Key vault secret

BuildSecret.description: BuildSecret holds general information about image hubs

name.description: Name name of the build secret

status.description:
Status of the secret
Pending = Secret value is not set
Consistent = Secret value is set

Component.description: Component describe an component part of an deployment

ports.description: Ports defines the port number and protocol that a component is exposed for internally in environment

scheduledJobPayloadPath.description: ScheduledJobPayloadPath defines the payload path, where payload for Job Scheduler will be mapped as a file. From radixconfig.yaml

schedulerPort.description: SchedulerPort defines the port number that a Job Scheduler is exposed internally in environment

variables.description: Variable names map to values. From radixconfig.yaml

ComponentSummary.description: ComponentSummary describe a component part of a deployment

DNSAlias.description: DNSAlias holds public DNS alias information

componentName.description: ComponentName the component exposing the endpoint

environmentName.description: EnvironmentName the environment hosting the endpoint

DeployKeyAndSecret.description: DeployKeyAndSecret Holds generated public deploy key and shared secret

publicDeployKey.description: PublicDeployKey the public value of the deploy key

activeFrom.description: ActiveFrom Timestamp when the deployment starts (or created)

activeTo.description: ActiveTo Timestamp when the deployment ends

environment.description: Environment the environment this Radix application deployment runs in

gitCommitHash.description: GitCommitHash the hash of the git commit from which radixconfig.yaml was parsed

gitTags.description: GitTags the git tags that the git commit hash points to

name.description: Name the unique name of the Radix application deployment

namespace.description: Namespace where the deployment is stored

repository.description: Repository the GitHub repository that the deployment was built from

DeploymentItem.description: DeploymentItem describe a deployment short info

activeFrom.description: ActiveFrom Timestamp when the deployment starts (or created)

activeTo.description: ActiveTo Timestamp when the deployment ends

gitCommitHash.description: GitCommitHash the hash of the git commit from which radixconfig.yaml was parsed

name.description: Name the unique name of the Radix application deployment

activeFrom.description: ActiveFrom Timestamp when the deployment starts (or created)

activeTo.description: ActiveTo Timestamp when the deployment ends

commitID.description: CommitID the commit ID of the branch to build

environment.description: Environment the environment this Radix application deployment runs in

gitCommitHash.description: GitCommitHash the hash of the git commit from which radixconfig.yaml was parsed

gitTags.description: GitTags the git tags that the git commit hash points to

name.description: Name the unique name of the Radix application deployment

promotedFromEnvironment.description:
Name of the environment the deployment was promoted from
Applies only for pipeline jobs of type 'promote'

commitID.description: CommitID the commit ID of the branch to build

promotedFromEnvironment.description:
Name of the environment the deployment was promoted from
Applies only for pipeline jobs of type 'promote'

EnvVarMetadata.description: EnvVarMetadata Environment variable metadata, holding state of creating or changing of value in Radix console

radixConfigValue.description: Value of the environment variable in radixconfig.yaml

value.description: Value a new value of the environment variable

Environment.description: Environment holds detail information about environment

branchMapping.description: BranchMapping The branch mapped to this environment

status.description:
Status of the environment
Pending = Environment exists in Radix config, but not in cluster
Consistent = Environment exists in Radix config and in cluster
Orphan = Environment does not exist in Radix config, but exists in cluster

EnvironmentSummary.description: EnvironmentSummary holds general information about environment

branchMapping.description: BranchMapping The branch mapped to this environment

status.description:
Status of the environment
Pending = Environment exists in Radix config, but not in cluster
Consistent = Environment exists in Radix config and in cluster
Orphan = Environment does not exist in Radix config, but exists in cluster

Event.description: Event holds information about Kubernetes events

involvedObjectKind.description: Kind of object involved in this event

involvedObjectName.description: Name of object involved in this event

involvedObjectNamespace.description: Namespace of object involved in this event

lastTimestamp.description: The time (ISO8601) at which the event was last recorded

message.description: A human-readable description of the status of this event
message.example: 'Readiness probe failed: dial tcp 10.40.1.5:3003: connect: connection refused'

reason.description: A short, machine understandable string that gives the reason for this event

ExternalDNS.description: ExternalDNS describes an external DNS entry for a component

HorizontalScalingSummary.description: HorizontalScalingSummary describe the summary of horizontal scaling of a component

currentCPUUtilizationPercentage.description: Component current average CPU utilization over all pods, represented as a percentage of requested CPU

currentMemoryUtilizationPercentage.description: Component current average memory utilization over all pods, represented as a percentage of requested memory

targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.description: Component target average CPU utilization over all pods

targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage.description: Component target average memory utilization over all pods

ImageHubSecret.description: ImageHubSecret holds general information about image hubs

server.description: Server name of the image hub

status.description:
Status of the secret
Pending = Secret value is not set
Consistent = Secret value is set

username.description: Username for connecting to private image hub

Job.description: Job holds general information about job

commitID.description: CommitID the commit ID of the branch to build

components.description:
Components (array of ComponentSummary) created by the job

Deprecated: Inspect each deployment to get list of components created by the job

imageTagNames.description: Image tags names for components - if empty will use default logic

promotedDeploymentName.description: PromotedDeploymentName the name of the deployment that was promoted

promotedFromEnvironment.description: PromotedFromEnvironment the name of the environment that was promoted from

promotedToEnvironment.description: PromotedToEnvironment the name of the environment that was promoted to

rerunFromJob.description: RerunFromJob The source name of the job if this job was restarted from it

triggeredBy.description: TriggeredBy user that triggered the job. If through webhook = sender.login. If through api = usertoken.upn

JobSummary.description: JobSummary holds general information about job

commitID.description: CommitID the commit ID of the branch to build

imageTagNames.description: Image tags names for components - if empty will use default logic

promotedFromEnvironment.description: Environment name, from which the Radix deployment is promoted

promotedToEnvironment.description: Environment name, to which the Radix deployment is promoted

triggeredBy.description: TriggeredBy user that triggered the job. If through webhook = sender.login. If through api - usertoken.upn

Node.description: Node Defines node attributes, where pod should be scheduled

gpu.description: Gpu Holds lists of node GPU types, with dashed types to exclude

gpuCount.description: GpuCount Holds minimum count of GPU on node

Notifications.description: Notifications is the spec for notification about internal events or changes

webhook.description: Webhook is a URL for notification about internal events or changes. The URL should be of a Radix component or job-component, with not public port.

ObjectState.description: ObjectState holds information about the state of objects involved in an event

PipelineParametersBuild.description: PipelineParametersBuild describe branch to build and its commit ID

branch.description:
Branch the branch to build
REQUIRED for "build" and "build-deploy" pipelines

commitID.description:
CommitID the commit ID of the branch to build
REQUIRED for "build" and "build-deploy" pipelines

imageName.description: ImageName of the component, without repository name and image-tag

imageRepository.description: ImageRepository of the component, without image name and image-tag

imageTag.description: ImageTag of the image - if empty will use default logic

pushImage.description: PushImage should image be pushed to container registry. Defaults pushing

triggeredBy.description: TriggeredBy of the job - if empty will use user token upn (user principle name)

commitID.description:
CommitID the commit ID of the branch
OPTIONAL for information only

toEnvironment.description:
Name of environment to deploy
REQUIRED for "deploy" pipeline

triggeredBy.description: TriggeredBy of the job - if empty will use user token upn (user principle name)

PipelineParametersPromote.description: PipelineParametersPromote identify deployment to promote and a target environment

deploymentName.description:
ID of the deployment to promote
REQUIRED for "promote" pipeline

fromEnvironment.description:
Name of environment where to look for the deployment to be promoted
REQUIRED for "promote" pipeline

toEnvironment.description:
Name of environment to receive the promoted deployment
REQUIRED for "promote" pipeline

triggeredBy.description: TriggeredBy of the job - if empty will use user token upn (user principle name)

PipelineRun.description: PipelineRun holds general information about pipeline run

env.description: Env Environment of the pipeline run

name.description: Name Original name of the pipeline run

realName.description: RealName Name of the pipeline run in the namespace

PipelineRunTask.description: PipelineRunTask holds general information about pipeline run task

pipelineRunEnv.description: PipelineRunEnv Environment of the pipeline run

realName.description: RealName Name of the pipeline run in the namespace

PipelineRunTaskStep.description: PipelineRunTaskStep holds general information about pipeline run task steps

PodState.description: PodState holds information about the state of the first container in a Pod

ready.description: Specifies whether the first container has passed its readiness probe.

restartCount.description: The number of times the first container has been restarted

started.description: Specifies whether the first container has started.

Port.description: Port describe a port of a component

PromotionParameters.description: PromotionParameters describe environment to promote from and to

fromEnvironment.description: FromEnvironment the environment to promote from

toEnvironment.description: ToEnvironment the environment to promote to

ReceiverConfigMap.description: ReceiverConfigMap defines a map of ReceiverConfig where key is the name of the receiver

ReceiverConfigSecretStatusMap.description: ReceiverConfigSecretStatusMap defines a map of ReceiverConfigSecretStatus where key is the name of the receiver

ReplicaStatus.description: ReplicaStatus describes the status of a component container inside a pod

status.description:
Status of the container
Pending = Container in Waiting state and the reason is ContainerCreating
Failing = Container in Waiting state and the reason is anything else but ContainerCreating
Running = Container in Running state
Terminated = Container in Terminated state

ReplicaSummary.description: ReplicaSummary describes condition of a pod

image.description: The image the container is running.

restartCount.description: RestartCount count of restarts of a component container inside a pod

statusMessage.description: StatusMessage provides message describing the status of a component container inside a pod

ResourceRequirements.description: ResourceRequirements Requirements of resources for pods

ScheduledBatchRequest.description: ScheduledBatchRequest holds information about a creating scheduled batch request

deploymentName.description: Name of the Radix deployment for a batch

ScheduledBatchSummary.description: ScheduledBatchSummary holds information about scheduled batch

deploymentName.description: DeploymentName name of RadixDeployment for the batch

jobList.description: Jobs within the batch of ScheduledJobSummary

message.description: Deprecated: Message of a status, if any, of the job

totalJobCount.description: TotalJobCount count of jobs, requested to be scheduled by a batch

ScheduledJobRequest.description: ScheduledJobRequest holds information about a creating scheduled job request

deploymentName.description: Name of the Radix deployment for a job

ScheduledJobSummary.description: ScheduledJobSummary holds general information about scheduled job

Restart.description:
Timestamp of the job restart, if applied.
+optional

backoffLimit.description: BackoffLimit Amount of retries due to a logical error in configuration etc.

deploymentName.description: DeploymentName name of RadixDeployment for the job

failedCount.description: FailedCount is the number of times the job has failed

message.description: Message of a status, if any, of the job

timeLimitSeconds.description: TimeLimitSeconds How long the job supposed to run at maximum

Secret.description: Secret holds general information about secret

component.description: Component name of the component having the secret

id.description: ID of the secret within the Resource

name.description: Name of the secret or its property, related to type and resource)

status.description:
Status of the secret
Pending = Secret exists in Radix config, but not in cluster
Consistent = Secret exists in Radix config and in cluster
NotAvailable = Secret is available in external secret configuration but not in cluster

type.description:
Type of the secret
generic SecretTypeGeneric
azure-blob-fuse-volume SecretTypeAzureBlobFuseVolume
csi-azure-blob-volume SecretTypeCsiAzureBlobVolume
csi-azure-key-vault-creds SecretTypeCsiAzureKeyVaultCreds
csi-azure-key-vault-item SecretTypeCsiAzureKeyVaultItem
client-cert-auth SecretTypeClientCertificateAuth
oauth2-proxy SecretTypeOAuth2Proxy
type.x-go-enum-desc:
generic SecretTypeGeneric
azure-blob-fuse-volume SecretTypeAzureBlobFuseVolume
csi-azure-blob-volume SecretTypeCsiAzureBlobVolume
csi-azure-key-vault-creds SecretTypeCsiAzureKeyVaultCreds
csi-azure-key-vault-item SecretTypeCsiAzureKeyVaultItem
client-cert-auth SecretTypeClientCertificateAuth
oauth2-proxy SecretTypeOAuth2Proxy

secretValue.description: Name the unique name of the Radix application deployment

Type of the secret
generic SecretTypeGeneric
azure-blob-fuse-volume SecretTypeAzureBlobFuseVolume
csi-azure-blob-volume SecretTypeCsiAzureBlobVolume
csi-azure-key-vault-creds SecretTypeCsiAzureKeyVaultCreds

oauth2-proxy SecretTypeOAuth2Proxy

generic SecretTypeGeneric

csi-azure-blob-volume SecretTypeCsiAzureBlobVolume
csi-azure-key-vault-creds SecretTypeCsiAzureKeyVaultCreds

SetExternalDNSTLSRequest.description: SetExternalDNSTLSRequest describes request body for setting private key and certificate for external DNS TLS

enabled.description: Enabled flag indicates if alert notifications should be sent to Slack

webhookUrlConfigured.description: WebhookURLConfigured flag indicates if a Slack webhook URL is set

Step.description: Step holds general information about job step

TLS.description: TLS configuration and status for external DNS

certificateStatus.description:
Status of the certificate
Pending CertificatePending  Certificate is not set
Consistent CertificateConsistent  Certificate is valid
Invalid CertificateInvalid  Certificate is invalid
certificateStatus.x-go-enum-desc:
Pending CertificatePending  Certificate is not set
Consistent CertificateConsistent  Certificate is valid
Invalid CertificateInvalid  Certificate is invalid

certificateStatusMessages.description: CertificateStatusMessages contains a list of messages related to CertificateStatus

certificates.description:
Certificates holds the X509 certificate chain
The first certificate in the list should be the host certificate and the rest should be intermediate certificates

privateKeyStatus.description:
Status of the private key
Pending PrivateKeyPending  Private key is not set
Consistent PrivateKeyConsistent  Private key is valid
Invalid PrivateKeyInvalid  Private key is invalid
privateKeyStatus.x-go-enum-desc:
Pending PrivateKeyPending  Private key is not set
Consistent PrivateKeyConsistent  Private key is valid
Invalid PrivateKeyInvalid  Private key is invalid

privateKeyStatusMessages.description: PrivateKeyStatusMessages contains a list of messages related to PrivateKeyStatus

useAutomation.description: UseAutomation describes if TLS certificate is automatically issued using automation (ACME)

UpdateAlertingConfig.description: UpdateAlertingConfig contains fields for updating alert settings

UpdateReceiverConfigSecrets.description: UpdateReceiverConfigSecrets defines secrets to be updated

UpdateReceiverConfigSecretsMap.description: UpdateReceiverConfigSecretsMap defines a map of UpdateReceiverConfigSecrets where key is the name of the receiver

UpdateSlackConfigSecrets.description: UpdateSlackConfig defines secrets to be updated for Slack

webhookUrl.description:
WebhookURL the Slack webhook URL where alerts are sent
Secret key for webhook URL is updated if a non-nil value is present, and deleted if omitted or set to null

required:

X509Certificate.description: X509Certificate holds information about a X509 certificate

dnsNames.description: DNSNames defines list of Subject Alternate Names in the certificate

issuer.description: Issuer contains the distinguished name for the certificate's issuer
issuer.example: CN=DigiCert TLS RSA SHA256 2020 CA1,O=DigiCert Inc,C=US

notAfter.description: NotAfter defines the uppdater date/time validity boundary

notBefore.description: NotBefore defines the lower date/time validity boundary

subject.description: Subject contains the distinguished name for the certificate
